leitej.util.machine

Class ConsoleUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • leitej.util.machine.ConsoleUtil

  • public class ConsoleUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    An useful class to help in interact with console.
    Author:
    Julio Leite
